## Conditions.Condition.create() method

Creates a new [Condition](./ts-res.conditions.condition.md) object from the supplied [validated condition declaration](./ts-res.conditions.ivalidatedconditiondecl.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static create(decl: IValidatedConditionDecl): Result<Condition>;
```
